description: Map URLs to discover all accessible links and site structure using Firecrawl API.

api_key.info: The API key to use Firecrawl API.

urls.info: List of URLs to create maps from (separated by commas or new lines).

ignore_sitemap.info: When true, the sitemap.xml file will be ignored during mapping.

sitemap_only.info: When true, only links found in the sitemap will be returned.

include_subdomains.info: When true, subdomains of the provided URL will also be scanned.

errors.import_failed: Could not import firecrawl integration package. Please install it with `pip install firecrawl-py`.

logs.params_configured: Parameters configured - Ignore sitemap: {ignore_sitemap}, Sitemap only: {sitemap_only}, Include subdomains: {include_subdomains}
logs.app_initialized: Firecrawl app initialized with API key
logs.mapping_completed: Mapping completed - Total: {total_links} link(s) from {urls_processed} URL(s)
